Package curam.util.ctm.bom

Contains the interfaces and utilities which provide support for implementing the infrastructure BOMS for the CTM infrastructure

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
AuthorisationBOM The module checks if logged in user has access to do read/write operation on business object module.
BusinessObjectModule Business object modules are administration objects that can be transported from one system to another.
DeleteBOM Infrastructure depends on BOM implementation for every business object type that can be deleted.
DependentBOM Infrastructure delegates to DependentBOM implementation to populate list of all immediate dependent business object.
ExistenceBOM Infrastructure depends on BusinessObjectModule implementation for every business object type to determine if it exist.
InformationalBOM Business object types that do require to display business object information will require bespoke implementations of this BusinessObjectModule (BOM).
PostCommitActionBOM Business object types that do require post-commit processing will require bespoke implementations of this BusinessObjectModule(BOM).
PreCommitActionBOM Business object types that do require pre-commit processing will require bespoke implementations of this BusinessObjectModule(BOM).
PreCommitActionTypeBOM Business object types that require pre-commit actions that are applicable at a business object type level rather than at a business object instance level can provide customized implementations of this BOM.
ReadAndUpsertBOM Infrastructure depends on BOM implementation for every business object that can be transported.
RevertChangeSetConstructionHandlerBOM Business object types that require to customize the process of constructing the revert change set can provide customized implementation of this BOM to achieve the desired functionality.
SecurityBOM Security module provides a mechanism to define security identifier for each BusinessObjectModule.
 

Class Summary
BOMConstants Defines constants to be used by business object module implementation.
BOMExceptionHandlerUtils Class that manages the exception handling scenarios that happens during the invocation of various BusinessObjectModule related hook methods, such as upsertEntity, setPrimaryKey, from the BusinessObjectHelper class.
BOMPostUpsertMethodInvoker The class modularizes the invocation call the happens after the update/insert operation for a business object module for the purpose of deleting unwanted child entities for a given business object instance..
BusinessObjectHelper This helper class constructs the XML using the data which is read from the entities of a business object.
BusinessObjectHelperUtils Utility class written for BusinessObjectHelper which contains the commonly used methods such as XML parsing from business object's document object, populating data related to shared data map, methods that assists the usage of reflective APIs etc.
BusinessObjectModuleImpl Standard implementation of BusinessObjectModule.
BusinessObjectsComparer A comparer implementation that compares the content of two business object instances.
ComparisonResult Holder class that collects the reporting data related to results after comparison.
MapDataComparer A comparer implementation that can compare two sets of data originating from a map and will report the differences among the data set.
 

Package curam.util.ctm.bom Description

Contains the interfaces and utilities which provide support for implementing the infrastructure BOMS for the CTM infrastructure.

Since:
Curam SDEJ6.0.0
